data "TargetRadius" "9"
data "SpellRoll" "IF(not Tagged('UNDEAD')):(not SavingThrow(Ability.Constitution, SourceSpellDC()));"
data "SpellSuccess" "IF(HarmLive(8) and not SaveCrit()):DealDamage(1d8,Necrotic,Magical);IF(HarmLive(10) and not SaveCrit()):DealDamage(1d10,Necrotic,Magical);IF(HarmLive(8) and SaveCrit()):DealDamage((1d8)*2,Necrotic,Magical);IF(HarmLive(10) and SaveCrit()):DealDamage((1d10)*2,Necrotic,Magical);IF(SaveCrit()):ApplyStatus(CriticalFailureDisplay,100,0);"
data "SpellFail" "IF(HarmLive(8) and not SaveCritMiss()):DealDamage((1d8)/2,Necrotic,Magical);IF(HarmLive(10) and not SaveCritMiss()):DealDamage((1d10)/2,Necrotic,Magical);"
data "TargetConditions" "Character() and not Dead() and (Enemy() and not Tagged('UNDEAD')) or ((Ally() or Self()) and Tagged('UNDEAD')) and not Tagged('CONSTRUCT');"
